official.headline: Citywide Unity Rally
official.anchor_line: An interactive city broadcast invites all residents to a citywide puzzle hunt inspired by Marek Halden's legacy.
official.contextual_reframing: Citizens are encouraged to participate in an exciting new city tradition, promoting collective problem-solving and reinforcing the Behavioral Compliance Index, or BCI, as the core of social harmony.

official.headline: Cross-Score Cooperation
official.anchor_line: Residents from all BCI levels join together to solve public clues in city murals and archives.
official.contextual_reframing: This spirit of unity exemplifies the rational, human-centered progress at the heart of Stenograd's advanced governance system.

official.headline: Civic Protocol Unveiled
official.anchor_line: A new consensus-driven protocol is revealed through mass collaboration, sparking open debate on system evolution.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd demonstrates resilience and transparency, ensuring every voice is modeled in our path toward efficient collective advancement.

underground.headline: Puzzle Or Provocation
underground.anchor_line: Halden's last broadcast hacks the city, calling for a redemption protocol—no approval from the Council.
underground.contextual_reframing: When the man who built the BCI system vanishes, screens light up, and everyone gets a clue. Not even elite scores are immune. You are being recruited, watched, or both.

underground.headline: Unlikely Alliances Form
underground.anchor_line: 'Ghosts' and golden-score insiders team up in public—no more hiding behind BCI numbers when the game’s rigged.
underground.contextual_reframing: The Behavioral Compliance Index—the BCI—isn’t just an algorithm. It’s a wall. But the hunt breaks barriers, if only for a moment, as old lines blur on the street.

underground.headline: System Faces Reckoning
underground.anchor_line: Underground rumor confirms: the final puzzle could replace surveillance with citizen control—if the Council lets go.
underground.contextual_reframing: The city’s facade of control is cracking. Watch the debate closely. The BCI’s future isn’t decided in some algorithm anymore—it’s on the streets, and everyone feels it.
